highlights: B2B SaaS application to allow end users to effectively manage and get reporting for their visitors.
Customizable user types and check-in workflows for each visitor type.
Configurable alerts and notifications for check-in, check-out, delivery, etc.
Robust reporting for visitor data.
Visitor training and screening features.
Touchless check-ins and visitor badge printing to allow visitor access to restricted locations.
Multilingual support and ability for end users to have different workflows for each visitor locale.
Integration with Azure AD and Active Directory for syncing location employees.
Interactive notification integrations with MS Teams and Slack to assist workflows.
SMS integration.
SMS Blast functionality to quickly send notifications to all visitors or everyone in case of emergencies.

I developed interactive and scalable UI features using Vue.js, optimized complex data visualizations, and helped build customizable tagging and playlist tools.
My focus was on delivering a smooth user experience despite heavy data workloads.

Set up automated testing pipeline with Jest and Cypress, achieving 85% test coverage
